Change the dashboard style (rounded corners)
format:
<style>
/*Change button corner radius (rounded corners)*/
.md-button{             
    border-radius: 10px
}

/*Change card tiles radius (rounded corners)*/
.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
    border-radius: 10px;
}

/*Change style atributes of tile titles (rounded corners)*/
.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle{
    font-size:20px;
    font-weight:bold;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 10px;
}

/* Track */
::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: #333333;
}
 
/* Handle */
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background: #f84018;
  border-radius:10px;
}

/* Handle on hover */
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
  background: #af560a;
}

#SYSTEM_POWER_cards{
  font-size:20px !important;
}

</style>

label: Restore before update
payload: Be sure to make a backup

topic: Do you want to restore to version before update ?

name: File Browser
info:
1) Update the default folder in the Init node
2) Update the default folder in the Reset node as well
3) You can duplicate the Reset nodes and use them as saved shortcuts
4) Check the Convert Timestamps function node if you want to see your dates in a different format. I just used the Javascript toISOString format.
5) The Graph button can read any CSV file which have any number of values, but the first column always contains a timestamp column with javascript timestamp of the data point.

Logo in toolbar
format:
<script id="clockScript1" type="text/javascript">
    
    var flag;
    var logo = new Image();
    
    
    (function(scope) {
    // watch msg object from Node-RED
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        // new message received
        logo.setAttribute('src', msg.payload); 
        });
    })(scope);

    $(function () {
        
        if(flag) return;
        
        //add logo
        var div1 = $('<div/>');
        
        // logo.src = 'data:image/png;base64,'
        logo.height = 45;
        div1[0].style.margin = 'auto 10px auto auto';

        div1.append(logo);

        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(div1);
            flag = true;
        }
        addToToolbar();
    });
</script>
